name: A Better Place (Games Academy)
description:
A better place challenges the player to enable the main character Aamon escaping hell, to become human. The mechanics are inspired by a classical jump and run game, but also add elements like collecting souls and moving assets to get through the level. The game design has been inspired by Hollow Knight and Donkey Kong.

Key Facts

Genre: Jump and Run

Spieleranzahl: Single player/Platformer

Plattform: PC

Steuerung: Keyboard/Mouse

Zielgruppe: Teenager 12-18

Artstyle: Cartoon

Perspektive: Level linear ascending

Game Engine: Unity, 2D

Unique selling point:

a cute little demon who wants to be human
